main.c

00001 //POB-Technology 2008
00002 // dc motor example
00003 #include <dual-pob.h>
00004 
00005 int main(void)
00006 {
00007         UInt8 low_speed = 1;
00008         UInt8 high_speed = 30;
00009 
00010         // init dual-pob servomotor hardware
00011         InitDualServo();
00012 
00013         while(1)
00014         {
00015                 // set speed of dc motor
00016                 SetDCSpeed(high_speed);
00017         
00018                 // active dc motor for 1 second
00019                 SetDCMotor(DC_MOTOR_RUN);
00020                 Wait_Ms(1000);
00021 
00022                 // move back for 1 second
00023                 SetDCMotor(DC_MOTOR_BACK);
00024                 Wait_Ms(1000);
00025 
00026                 // set low speed of dc motor
00027                 SetDCSpeed(low_speed);
00028 
00029                 // and turn left for 1 second
00030                 SetDCMotor(DC_MOTOR_LEFT);
00031                 Wait_Ms(1000);
00032 
00033                 // turn right for 1 second
00034                 SetDCMotor(DC_MOTOR_RIGHT);
00035                 Wait_Ms(1000);
00036         }
00037 
00038         return 0;
00039 }
